pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, November 16, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 2:00 p.m.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers to discuss their ongoing collaboration to end the COVID-19 pandemic and get the job done on the vaccine rollout.

Media appearance

8:42 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on My Radio Edmonton 580 AM.
